info.title: Cisco-IOS-XE-wireless-mcast-oper
info.description:
This module contains a collection of YANG
     definitions for wireless multicast operational data.
     Copyright (c) 2018-2019, 2022 by Cisco Systems, Inc.
     All rights reserved.

Cisco IOS-XE operational state data (read-only).
**Category:** Wireless
**Paths:** 41

**YANG Model:** [Cisco-IOS-XE-wireless-mcast-oper.yang](https://github.com/YangModels/yang/blob/main/vendor/cisco/xe/17181/Cisco-IOS-XE-wireless-mcast-oper.yang)

ap-mac.description: AP MAC on which Multicast group is reported

cac-enabled.description: RRC CAC is enabled or not

cfg-stream-bw.description: Configured max video bandwidth for the new stream

current-rate.description: Current data rate of the client requesting stream

video-pkt-size.description: Packet size for the new video stream

curr-video-util.description: Current video utilization of AP radio

curr-voice-util.description: Current voice utilization of AP radio

curr-channel-util.description: Current channel utilization of AP radio

curr-queue-util.description: Current queue utilization of AP radio

curr-video-pps.description: Current video rate in packets per second of AP radio

video-delay-hist-severe.description: Number of video packets with severe delay

video-pkt-loss-discard.description: Video packet loss discarded by AP

wlan-id.description: Client's WLAN ID associated with this stream

rerrc-enable.description: Is Re-RRC enable on this stream

rerrc-drop.description: Re-RRC drop decision in case of violation of constraints

radio.description: Radio on which Multicast group is reported

ap-name.description: AP name on which Multicast group is reported

ap-mac.description: AP MAC on which Multicast group is reported

group-ip.description: Multicast group IP address for this stream

mc-only-num-clients.description: Number of MC-only clients for MGID

mc2uc-num-deny-clients.description: Number of MC-UC deny clients for MGID

mc2uc-num-pending-clients.description: Number of MC-UC pending client for MGID

used.description: Multicast client entry is in use or not

slot-id.description: AP's Slot ID to which client was connected
